Perris Davis

Chief Executive Officer & Cheif Technology Officer

Perris is the CEO/CTO at MomentumIQ. He lives and works in Seattle Washington. He has built world class mobile features used by millions of customers in both enterprise and start-up environments such Apple, Capital One, Robinhood & Hedge. Check out his FOSS projects SFSymbols, Missions and Napkin (all available on GitHub). Ask him anything.
